author: IGN
description:
Mexican Ninja is coming soon to PC (Steam) with an updated demo available now on Steam. 
Take a look at the 'Way of the Donkey' gameplay trailer for Mexican Ninja, the 2.5D arcade action roguelike developed by Madbricks. Players will assume the role of a Mexican Ninja to take the fight to the streets of Nuevo Tokyo. The updated demo gives players the best look yet at the chaos of Nuevo Tokyo, including a furious panda fully committed to ruining your day, a new parry-anything system, and tougher early encounters + faster progression.

#IGN #gaming
title: Mexican Ninja - Official 'Way of the Donkey' Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take the reins of a racing legacy as the Ferrari F40 roars into the Shop! Watch the trailer for a peek at what you can expect.

#ign #gaming
title: Fortnite x Ferrari - Official Collaboration Trailer

author: IGN
description: Ubisoft is celebrating the 10th anniversary of popular platform fighting game Brawlhalla with its biggest crossover yet: Attack on Titan. Eren, Mikasa, and Levi join Brawlhalla in celebration of the game's big milestone. The Brawlhalla x Attack on Titan Crossover Event is fated to begin December 3rd! Pick up your favorite Scouts as Crossovers and emojis, and strike terror into the hearts of your opponents with additional AOT themed Items.
title: Attack on Titan x Brawlhalla - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the War Rats trailer for this action shoot 'em up game to see gameplay and the terrible enemies you'll face. Run and gun alongside your troops in the Great Rat War against the vile TechnoRat armies. Recruit units, build structures, collect gear, and upgrade your weapons to turn the tide of battle in your favor. War Rats is available now on Steam.
title: War Rats - Official Version 1.0 Release Date Teaser Trailer
